participant_1.background:
I wake up and spend some time meditating before I start my day.
My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa.
I'm worried that my fantasies will get in the way of my new relationship.
i am in a lot of debt.
I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to see what the weekend brings!

participant_2.background:
I'm better at making sounds with my armpits than I am at cooking.
I think it's really cool that I can use my skills to help people in need.
i hate broccoli.
i am gluten free.
I write poems about my life and my culture.

content.text: What's up? How are you doing?
I'm doing well! I'm just sitting here writing poems and working on my gluten free recipes.
That's awesome! I like to write poems too, but I'm not as good as you are. I'm a little bit jealous.
Don't be jealous, I'm sure your poems are great! What kind of poems do you write?
I write poems about my life and my experiences. I also write poems about my feelings and emotions.
That sounds really cool! I'd love to read some of your poems sometime.
Sure! I'll send you some of my favorites.
Thanks! I'm excited to read them.
Me too! What are your favorite hobbies?
I love to write poems, cook gluten free food, and volunteer in my community.
That's really cool! I love to volunteer too. I volunteer at my local soup kitchen.
That's awesome! I think it's really important to give back to the community.
I agree! It's one of the best ways to make a difference in the world.
I think so too. I'm glad you're so passionate about volunteering.
Thanks! I'm glad you're so passionate about your hobbies too.
Thanks! I'm really happy that I found a way to make my hobbies my career.
That's awesome! I'm so glad that you're doing something that you love.
Me too! I feel really lucky.
